version_description:
*Added another "Game Over" end.
*Fixed another freeze trap glitch.

*Fixed a problem with the game freezes when you escape with the car on practice mode.
*Fixed a glitch with the planks in the new area.
*Fixed a glitch with the freeze trap.
*Fixed a text problem in the game.
*Fixed some small bugs.

* Bigger house to explore.
* Granny has a "new" rusty car.
* New pet
* Now another way to defend yourself from Granny.
* Fixed som small bugs.

*Added rats (Nightmare mode).
*Christmas is gone.
*Fixed some bugs.

* More places to explore.
* More objects to find.
* Added Extreme difficulty.
* An extra lock on the main door (Extreme only)
* Fixed some bugs.

* Granny's got legs :)
